post:
TNAHosting is happy to offer the following deals to the LET community. We've been in business since 2012, providing a variety of reliable and cost effective services.  
  
  
OpenVZ
=============================    
     
**6GB OpenVZ**  
* 1 IPv4    
* 2x vCore  
* <del>200GB</del> 400GB HDD   
* 5TB Bandwidth  
* $5/month - [Order Here](https://tnahosting.net/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=54)  
  

Dedicated  
=============================  

**Dual L5420 Dedicated Server**    
* Dual L5420 - 8 Cores @ 2.5GHz  
* 24GB DDR2  
* 2TB HDD  
* 15TB Bandwidth @ 1Gbps  
* /29 IPv4  
* $19/month - [Order Here](https://tnahosting.net/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=12&promocode=Y4R0RQ1L9I)  
  
**E3-1240 Dedicated Server**  
* E3-1240 - 4Cores/8Threads @ 3.3GHz / 3.7Ghz Turbo  
* 16GB RAM  
* 2x 500GB SSD + 2TB HDD    
* 15TB Bandwidth @ 1Gbps  
* /29 IPv4   
* $39/month - [Order Here](https://tnahosting.net/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=71)    
    
**E3-1240 v2 Dedicated Server**  
* E3-1240 v2 4Cores/8Threads @ 3.4GHz / 3.8Ghz Turbo
* 16GB RAM  
* 240GB SDD + 2TB HDD    
* 15TB Bandwidth @ 1Gbps  
* /29 IPv4    
* $42/month - [Order Here](https://tnahosting.net/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=63)    


Colocation   
=============================  
**1U Server Colocation**  
* 1U Colocation of rack mount server at our Chicago, IL location  
* Up to 1 Amp @ 120v  
* 20TB Bandwidth @ 1Gbps  
* Optional second network drop for IPMI  
* /29 IPv4  
* $30/month - [Order Here](https://tnahosting.net/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=78&promocode=3QYBTQ11FY)  
  
**Raspberry Pi Colocation**  
* Colocation of 1 Raspberry Pi at our Chicago, IL location  
* Ability to include a 2.5" external hard drive  
* 5TB Bandwidth @ 1Gbps  
* 1 IPv4 Address   
* $6/month - [Order Here](https://tnahosting.net/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=79&promocode=1I3I50GUWL)  
  
    
    
Virtual servers are setup instantly after payment. Dedicated servers are setup within 2-4 business days.    
  
OpenVZ nodes are currently OpenVZ 6 - but we plan to migrate to OpenVZ 7 before EOL. 
  
Chicago Looking Glass: http://lg.chi2.tnahosting.net/  
   
We accept PayPal, Major Credit/Debit Cards (Stripe), and Bitcoin.  
 
Have questions or need something custom? Feel free to PM me or open a [sales ticket](https://tnahosting.net/billing/submitticket.php?step=2&deptid=2).
